content: here is an easy neckwarmer which you can knit in few hours only in addition to the knitting pattern you will need the following to knit this neckwarmer 1 skein albus shown in color vanille 1 skein hermione shown in limited edition 202 you will only use few grams from the skein so you will have plenty to work another project ♥ circular needles or dpn neecles of 6 mm us#10 or size needed to obtain gauge 1 stitch marker 1 cable needle have fun la version française du patron est disponible sur leslainesbiscotte com 1 1 https //leslainesbiscotte com/products/cache-cou-doux-patron-gratuit
